---
name: doc-arduino-interface
description: Generate Doxygen comments for the ODriveArduino class
agent: ask
---

Generate Doxygen-style comments for the public interface of the `ODriveArduino` class in [Arduino/ODriveArduino/](Arduino/ODriveArduino/).

For each public method:
1. Provide a brief `@brief` description
2. Document all `@param` inputs
3. Document `@return` values
4. Note any hardware dependencies
